translation.en: [Mike] Something is coming. Something hungry for blood.
translation.fr: Un truc approche. Il est assoiffé de sang.

translation.en: A shadow grows on the wall behind you, swallowing you in darkness.
translation.fr:
Une ombre se dresse sur le mur
derrière vous, vous plonge dans le noir.

translation.en: -It is almost here. -What is it?
translation.fr:
- Il est tout près.
- C'est quoi ?

translation.en: What if it's the Demogorgon?
Oh, Jesus, we're so screwed if it's the Demogorgon.
translation.fr: Zut, on est foutus si c'est le Démogorgon.

translation.en: It's not the Demogorgon.
An army of troglodytes charge into the chamber!
translation.fr: Une armée de troglodytes nous attaque !

translation.en: -Troglodytes? -Told ya. [chuckling]
translation.fr:
- Des troglodytes ?
- Je te l'avais dit.

translation.en: [softly] Wait a minute.
Did you hear that?
That... that sound?
That didn't come from the troglodytes. No, that... That came from something else.
translation.fr:
Ce n'était pas les troglodytes.
C'était autre chose.

translation.en: -The Demogorgon! -[all groaning]
-We're in deep shit. -Will, your action!
-I don't know! -Fireball him!
translation.fr:
- Je sais pas !
- Boule de feu !

translation.en: I'd have to roll a 13 or higher!
Too risky. Cast a protection spell.
-Don't be a pussy. Fireball him! -Cast Protection.
translation.fr:
- Du cran. Boule de feu !
- Sort de protection.

translation.en: The Demogorgon is tired of your silly human bickering!
translation.fr:
Le Démogorgon en a marre
de vos querelles !

translation.en: It stomps towards you. -Boom! -Fireball him!
translation.fr:
- Il approche.
- Envoie-lui une boule de feu !

translation.en: -Another stomp, boom! -Cast Protection.
translation.fr:
- Encore un pas !
- Sort de protection.

translation.en: -He roars in anger! -[all clamoring]
translation.fr:
Il gronde de colère ! - Protection !
- Boule de feu !

translation.en: -Fireball! -[die clattering]
-Oh, shit! -[Lucas] Where'd it go?
[Lucas] Where is it? [Will] I don't know!
translation.fr:
- Il est où ?
- Je sais pas !

translation.en: -Is it a 13? -[Will] I don't know!
[Lucas] Where is it? [Dustin] Oh, my God!
[Karen] Mike! [Dustin] Oh, my God! Oh, my God!
[Karen] Mike! [Lucas] Can you find it yet?
[Will] No, I can't find it!
-Mike! -[Dustin] Oh, my God! Oh, my God!
Mom, we're in the middle of a campaign!
translation.fr: Mais on est en pleine campagne !

translation.en: You mean the end? Fifteen after.
translation.fr: À la fin, j'espère ! T'as vu l'heure ?

translation.en: [Lucas] Oh, my God! Freaking idiot! [Will] Why do we have to go?
translation.fr:
- Mais quel imbécile !
- Pourquoi on doit arrêter ?

translation.en: -Mom, wait, just 20 more minutes! -It's a school night, Michael.
translation.fr:
- Encore 20 minutes !
- Il y a école demain.

translation.en: I just put Holly to bed. You can finish next weekend.
translation.fr:
J'ai couché Holly.
Vous finirez un autre jour.

translation.en: -But that'll ruin the flow! -Michael--
I'm serious, Mom.
The campaign took two weeks to plan.
translation.fr:
On a mis deux semaines
à préparer la campagne.

translation.en: How was I supposed to know it was gonna take ten hours?
translation.fr: Ça nous a pris dix heures.

translation.en: You've been playing for ten hours?
-Dad, don't you think that 20 more-- -I think you should listen to your mother.
translation.fr:
- Papa, encore 20 minutes...
- Écoute ta mère.

translation.en: -[static crackling on TV] -[grunts] Dang dumb piece of junk.
[Will] Oh, I got it!
-Does the seven count? -It was a seven?
translation.fr:
- Le sept compte ?
- C'était un sept ?

translation.en: Did Mike see it? Then it doesn't count.
translation.fr: Mike l'a vu ? Alors, ça ne compte pas.

translation.en: [Dustin] Yo, hey, guys.
-Does anyone want this? -[both] No.
No, I don't think...
Yeah, he's cute.
Barb, no, I don't think so.
-Barb, you're not-- -Hey, Nancy.
There's a slice left if you want it.
-Sausage and pepperoni! -Hold on.
-There's something wrong with your sister. -What are you talking about?
translation.fr:
- Ta sœur a un problème.
- Comment ça ?

translation.en: -She's got a stick up her butt. -[Lucas] Yeah.
translation.fr: Elle a un balai dans le cul.

translation.en: It's because she's been dating that douchebag, Steve Harrington.
translation.fr:
C'est parce qu'elle sort
avec ce con de Steve.

translation.en: [Dustin] Yeah, she's turning into a real jerk.
She's always been a real jerk.
Nuh-uh, she used to be cool.
Like that time she dressed up as an elf for our Elder tree campaign.
translation.fr:
Elle s'était déguisée en elfe
pour notre campagne.

translation.en: [Mike] Four years ago!
[Dustin] Just saying. [Lucas] Later.
translation.fr:
- Je dis ça comme ça.
- À plus.

translation.en: -It was a seven. -Huh?
The roll, it was a seven.
translation.fr: Le dé avait fait un sept.

translation.en: The Demogorgon, it got me.
[grunts] See you tomorrow.
[Lucas] Good night, ladies. [Dustin] Kiss your mom 'night for me.
translation.fr:
- Bonne nuit, les filles.
- Embrasse ta mère pour moi.

translation.en: Race you back to my place? Winner gets a comic.
translation.fr: Le premier arrivé chez moi a une BD.

translation.en: -Any comic? -Yeah.
I didn't say "go"!
Get back here!
I'm gonna kill you!
translation.fr: Je vais te faire la peau !

translation.en: [Will] I'll take your X-Men 134!
Son of a bitch.
Mom?
-Jonathan? Mom? -[barking continues]
[woman on TV] And that's it for News Center this morning.
translation.fr: News Center, c'est terminé pour ce matin.

translation.en: Thanks for joining us.
Let's hand off now to Liz at the news desk.
[Liz] All right, thank you, Donna. Turning now to local news,
translation.fr:
Merci, Donna.
Passons à l'actualité locale.

translation.en: we're getting reports of surges and power outages all across the county.
translation.fr:
On nous signale des pannes de courant
dans tout le comté.

translation.en: Last night, hundreds of homes in East Hawkins were affected,
translation.fr:
Hier soir, des centaines de foyers
ont été touchés,

translation.en: leaving many residents in the dark.
translation.fr:
laissant de nombreux habitants
dans le noir.

translation.en: The cause of the outage is still unknown.
We reached out to Roane County Water and Electric,
translation.fr:
Un porte-parole de la Centrale
du Comté de Roane a indiqué

translation.en: and a spokesperson says that they are confident
translation.fr:
Un porte-parole de la Centrale
du Comté de Roane a indiqué que le courant devrait être rétabli
dans les derniers foyers

translation.en: power will be restored to all remaining homes
translation.fr:
que le courant devrait être rétabli
dans les derniers foyers

translation.en: within the next several hours.
-[dog barking] -[snorts]
translation.fr:
Vous avez eu de la peine en vous séparant
de votre jouet d'enfance préféré ?

translation.en: -[groans] -[watch beeps]
translation.fr:
Alors cette histoire ne manquera pas
de vous émouvoir.

translation.en: In other news, you might wanna stay home tonight
translation.fr: Mieux vaut rester chez vous ce soir,

translation.en: or at least pack an umbrella.
We turn to everybody's favorite morning weather guy, Charles.
[Joyce] Where the hell are they?
-Jonathan? -Check the couch!
Ugh, I did.
Oh... Got them.
Okay, sweetie, I will see you tonight.
-Yeah, see you later. -Where's Will?
Oh, I didn't get him up yet. -He's probably still sleeping. -[sighs]
translation.fr: Je ne l'ai pas réveillé. Il doit dormir.

translation.en: -Jonathan, you have to make sure he's up! -Mom, I'm making breakfast.
translation.fr:
- Tu dois le réveiller !
- Je prépare le petit-déj'.

translation.en: I told you this a thousand times.
translation.fr: Je te l'ai dit mille fois.

translation.en: Will! Come on, honey. It's time to get up.
translation.fr:
Will ! Allez, chéri,
c'est l'heure de se lever.

translation.en: -He came home last night, right? -He's not in his room?
translation.fr:
- Il est bien rentré hier soir ?
- Il n'est pas là ?

translation.en: -Did he come home or not? -I don't know.
translation.fr:
- Il est rentré ou pas ?
- Je ne sais pas.

translation.en: -You don't know? -No.
[stammering] I got home late. I was working. You were working?
translation.fr:
- Je suis rentré tard. Je bossais.
- Tu bossais ?

translation.en: Eric asked if I could cover. I said yeah.
I just thought we could use the extra cash.
-Jonathan, we've talked about this. -I know, I know.
translation.fr:
- On en a déjà parlé.
- Je sais.

translation.en: You can't take shifts when I'm working.
translation.fr: Pas quand je suis au travail.

translation.en: Mom, it's not a big deal. Look, he was at the Wheelers' all day.
translation.fr:
C'est rien.
Il a passé la journée chez les Wheeler.

translation.en: -I'm sure he just stayed over. -[sighs] I can't believe you.
translation.fr:
- Il a dû dormir là-bas.
- Toi, alors !

translation.en: I can't believe you sometimes.
-[phone ringing] -That's disgusting.
-[Mike] You're disgusting! -Hello?
translation.fr:
- C'est toi qui es dégoûtante !
- Allô ?

translation.en: Hi, Karen. It's Joyce.
-[Karen] Oh, Joyce, hi. -What the hell, Mike?
-[Ted] Hey! -Quiet!
-Language. -Are you kidding?
Was that Will I heard back there?
Will? No, no, no, it's just Mike.
Will didn't spend the night?
[Karen] No, he left here a little bit after 8:00.
translation.fr: Non, il est parti peu après 20 h.

translation.en: Why? He's not home?
Um, you know what? I think he just left early for... for school.
translation.fr:
Tu sais quoi ?
Il doit être parti à l'école.

translation.en: -Thank you so much. Bye. -Okay. Bye.
translation.fr:
- Merci beaucoup. Au revoir.
- Au revoir.

translation.en: That's weird. I don't see him.
translation.fr: C'est bizarre. Je ne le vois pas.

translation.en: [Lucas] I'm telling you, his mom's right.
He probably just went to class early again.
translation.fr: Il a dû aller tôt en cours.

translation.en: Yeah, he's always paranoid Gursky's gonna give him another pop quiz.
translation.fr: Il a peur qu'on ait une interro surprise.

translation.en: Step right up, ladies and gentlemen.
Step right up and get your tickets for the freak show.
translation.fr: Venez voir le musée des horreurs.

translation.en: Who do you think would make more money in a freak show?
Midnight, Frogface, or Toothless?
translation.fr: Charbon, Face de crapaud ou Sans-dents ?

translation.en: [mimicking Dustin] I'd go with Toothless.
I told you a million times, my teeth are coming in.
translation.fr:
Je vous l'ai dit mille fois,
mes dents vont pousser.

translation.en: It's called cleidocranial dysplasia.
[mimicking Dustin] "I told you a million times."
-[chuckles] -Do the arm thing.
Do it, freak!
[Troy] God, it gets me every time.
translation.fr: Bon sang, ça me débecte à chaque fois.

translation.en: -Assholes. -[Mike] I think it's kinda cool.
It's like you have superpowers or something.
translation.fr: Comme si tu avais des super pouvoirs.

translation.en: Like Mr. Fantastic.
[Dustin] Yeah, except I can't fight evil with it.
translation.fr: Mais je peux pas combattre le mal avec.

translation.en: [Barbara] So, did he call?
Keep your voice down.
Did he?
I told you, it's not like that.
Okay, I mean, yes, he likes me, but not like that.
translation.fr:
Oui, il m'aime bien,
mais pas dans ce sens-là.

translation.en: We just...
made out a couple times.
"We just... made out a couple times."
Nance, seriously,
you're gonna be so cool now, it's ridiculous.
translation.fr: tu vas avoir trop la classe.

translation.en: No, I'm not.
You better still hang out with me, that's all I'm saying.
translation.fr: T'as pas intérêt à me laisser tomber.

translation.en: If you become friends with Tommy H. or Carol--
translation.fr:
Si tu deviens copine
avec Tommy H ou Carol...

translation.en: Oh, that's gross!
Okay, I'm telling you, it was a one-time...
-Two-time thing. -[chuckles]
You were saying?
-Steve... -Mmm-hmm?
-I have to go. -In a minute.
translation.fr:
- Je dois y aller.
- Une minute.

translation.en: Steve. I really, like...
Seriously, I have to go.
Wait, wait, wait. Let's...
Come on, let's do something tonight, yeah?
translation.fr: Allez, faisons un truc ce soir.

translation.en: Uh... No, I can't. I have to study for Kaminsky's test.
Oh, come on. What's your GPA again? 3.999...
translation.fr: Tu as combien de moyenne, déjà ? 18...

translation.en: Kaminsky's tests are impossible.
-Well, then, just let me help. -You failed chem.
translation.fr:
- Je t'aiderai.
- Tu t'es planté en chimie.

translation.en: -C-minus. -Well, in that case...
translation.fr:
- J'ai eu un C moins.
- Dans ce cas...

translation.en: So I'll be over around, say, like, 8:00?
-Are you crazy? My mom would not-- -I'll climb through your window.
translation.fr:
- Tu es fou ? Ma mère...
- Je passerai par ta fenêtre.

translation.en: She won't even know I'm there. I'm stealthy, like a ninja.
translation.fr: Elle verra rien. Je suis un vrai ninja.

translation.en: You are crazy.
Wait, wait, wait. Just... Okay, forget about that.
We can just...
We can just, like, chill in my car.
We can find a nice quiet place to park, and...
translation.fr:
Se garer dans un endroit tranquille
et au calme...

translation.en: Steve... I have to study.
I'm not kidding.
Well, why do you think I want it to be nice and quiet?
translation.fr: Pourquoi je veux du calme, à ton avis ?

translation.en: You're an idiot, Steve Harrington.
translation.fr: Tu es un idiot, Steve Harrington.

translation.en: Meet me at Dearborn and Maple at 8:00.
translation.fr: Rejoins-moi à Dearborn et Maple à 20 h.

translation.en: To study.
Good of you to show.
[Hopper slurring] Oh, hey, morning, Flo. Morning, everybody.
-Hey, Chief. -Damn! You look like hell, Chief.
translation.fr:
- Salut, chef.
- Vous avez mauvaise mine.

translation.en: Well, I looked better than your wife when I left her this morning.
translation.fr:
Meilleure que votre femme
quand je l'ai quittée ce matin.

translation.en: While you were drinking or sleeping,
or whatever it is you deemed so necessary on Monday morning,
translation.fr:
ou quoi que vous jugez bon
de faire le lundi matin,

translation.en: Phil Larson called.
Said some kids are stealing the gnomes out of his garden again.
translation.fr: Des gosses ont volé ses nains de jardin.

translation.en: Oh, those garden gnomes again.
Well, I'll tell you what, I'm gonna get right on that.
translation.fr:
Vous savez quoi,
je m'en occupe sur-le-champ.

translation.en: On a more pressing matter,
Joyce Byers can't find her son this morning.
translation.fr:
Joyce Byers ne trouve pas
son fils ce matin.

translation.en: [muffled] Mmm. Okay, I'm gonna get on that.
translation.fr:
Joyce Byers ne trouve pas
son fils ce matin. D'accord, je m'en occupe.

translation.en: -Just give me a minute. -Joyce is very upset.
Well, Flo, Flo, we've discussed this.
translation.fr: Flo, on en a déjà parlé.

translation.en: Mornings are for coffee and contemplation.
translation.fr: Le matin, c'est café et contemplation.

translation.en: -Chief, she's already in your-- -Coffee and contemplation, Flo!
translation.fr:
- Elle est dans votre...
- Café et contemplation !

translation.en: I have been waiting here over an hour, Hopper.
translation.fr:
Ça fait plus d'une heure
que je poireaute, Hopper.

translation.en: [sighs deeply] And I apologize again.
I'm going out of my mind!
Look, boy his age, he's probably just playing hookie, okay?
translation.fr:
Un garçon de son âge,
il fait sûrement l'école buissonnière.

translation.en: No, not my Will. He's not like that.
translation.fr: Pas Will. Il n'est pas comme ça.

translation.en: -He wouldn't do that. -Well, you never know.
I mean, my mom thought I was on the debate team,
translation.fr: Ma mère me croyait à l'équipe de débat

translation.en: when really I was just screwing Chrissy Carpenter
in the back of my dad's Oldsmobile, so...
translation.fr: dans la caisse de mon père.

translation.en: Look, he's not like you, Hopper. He's not like me.
translation.fr:
Il n'est pas comme toi, Hopper.
Ni comme moi.

translation.en: He's not like... most.
translation.fr:
Il n'est pas comme...
la plupart des enfants.

translation.en: He has a couple of friends, but, you know, the kids, they're mean.
translation.fr:
Il a quelques amis,
mais tu sais, les enfants sont méchants.

translation.en: They make fun of him. They call him names.
-They laugh at him, his clothes-- -His clothes?
translation.fr:
- Ils rient de ses habits...
- Quoi ?

translation.en: -What's wrong with his clothes? -I don't know.
translation.fr:
- Quoi, ses habits ?
- Je ne sais pas.

translation.en: -Does that matter? -Maybe.
Look, he's... He's a sensitive kid.
Lonnie... [sighs] Lonnie used to say he was queer.
[softy] Called him a fag.
-Is he? -He's missing is what he is.
translation.fr:
- C'en est une ?
- Il a disparu, voilà tout.

translation.en: When was the last time you heard from Lonnie?
translation.fr: Tu as parlé à Lonnie récemment ?

translation.en: Uh, last I heard, he was in Indianapolis. That was about a year ago.
translation.fr:
Apparemment, il serait à Indianapolis.
Ça remonte à un an.

translation.en: -But he has nothing to do with this. -Why don't you give me his number?
translation.fr:
- Il n'a rien à y voir.
- Donne-moi son numéro.

translation.en: You know, Hopper, he has nothing to do with this. Trust me.
translation.fr: Il n'a rien à y voir. Crois-moi.

translation.en: Joyce, 99 out of 100 times, kid goes missing,
translation.fr:
Joyce, neuf fois sur dix,
quand un enfant disparaît,

translation.en: the kid is with a parent or relative.
translation.fr: il est avec un membre de la famille.

translation.en: [stammers] What about the other time?
-What? -You said, "99 out of 100."
translation.fr:
- Quoi ?
- Tu as dit : "Neuf fois sur dix."

translation.en: -What about the other time, the one? -Joyce.
The one!
-Joyce, this is Hawkins, okay? -[sighs]
You wanna know the worst thing that's ever happened here in the four years I've been working here? Do you wanna know the worst thing?
translation.fr:
Le pire qui soit arrivé
depuis quatre ans que je bosse ici ?

translation.en: It was when an owl attacked Eleanor Gillespie's head
translation.fr:
Un hibou a attaqué
la tête d'Eleanor Gillespie.

translation.en: because it thought that her hair was a nest.
translation.fr: Il l'avais prise pour un nid.

translation.en: Okay, fine. I will call Lonnie.
translation.fr: Très bien. Je vais appeler Lonnie.

translation.en: He will talk to me before he talks to--
-What, a pig? -A cop!
[voice breaking] Just find my son, Hop.
Find him!
[man] Dr. Brenner.
[scientist] This way, gentlemen.
The entire east wing will be evacuated within the hour.
translation.fr: L'aile Est va être évacuée dans l'heure.

translation.en: We've sealed off this area following quarantine protocol.
translation.fr:
On a bouclé ce secteur
suite au protocole de quarantaine.

translation.en: [man 1] This is where it came from? [man 2] Yes.
[man 1] And the girl?
She can't have gone far.
translation.fr: Elle n'a pas pu aller bien loin.

translation.en: [Ben] All right, and one more.
[man] Hey, Ben. What do you think about that, uh... Hey, I don't know. I don't know.
translation.fr:
- Ben, qu'en penses-tu ?
- Je ne sais pas.

translation.en: [man] I don't know, 37 points per game average--
[Ben] Thirty-seven now, but... [man] Mr. Basket.
Come here!
Hey, come here!
You think you can steal from me, boy?
translation.fr: Tu crois pouvoir me voler, petit ?

translation.en: What in the hell?
-[bell ringing] -[Mr. Clarke] Remember, finish chapter 12
and answer 12.3 on the difference between an experiment
translation.fr:
et répondez à la question
sur la différence entre une expérience

translation.en: and other forms of science investigation.
This will be on the test, which will cover chapters 10 through 12.
translation.fr:
Ce sera dans l'interro
qui couvrira les chapitres dix à douze.

translation.en: [trailing off] It will be multiple choice with an essay section.
translation.fr:
Ce sera un QCM
avec une partie dissertation.

translation.en: So, did it come?
Sorry, boys.
I hate to be the bearer of bad news, but...
it came.
The Heathkit ham shack. [Mike] Whoa. [Mr. Clarke] Ain't she a beaut?
translation.fr:
Le radioamateur Heathkit.
Il est pas beau ?

translation.en: I bet you can talk to New York on this thing.
translation.fr: On doit pouvoir parler à New York avec.

translation.en: Think bigger.
-California? -Bigger.
Australia?
-[boys exclaiming] -[Lucas] Oh, man!
When Will sees this, he's totally gonna blow his shit.
translation.fr:
Quand Will verra ça,
il fera dans son froc.

translation.en: Lucas!
-Sorry. -[Dustin chuckles]
[in Australian accent] Hello, this is Mike Wheeler, president of Hawkins Middle AV Club.
translation.fr:
Salut, ici Mike Wheeler, président du club
d'audiovisuel du collège d'Hawkins.

translation.en: [Lucas] What are you doing?
[in Australian accent] Hello, this is Dustin,
and this is the secretary and treasurer of Hawkins Middle AV Club.
translation.fr:
secrétaire et trésorier
du club d'audiovisuel.

translation.en: Do you eat kangaroos for breakfast?
translation.fr: Vous mangez du kangourou au petit-déj' ?

translation.en: Sorry to interrupt, but, uh, may I borrow Michael, Lucas and Dustin?
translation.fr:
Pardon de déranger, mais je pourrais
vous emprunter Michael, Lucas et Dustin ?

translation.en: One at a time, all right? You.
-You said he takes what? -Mirkwood.
-Mirkwood? -Yeah.
-Have you ever heard of Mirkwood? -I have not. That sounds made up to me.
translation.fr:
- Vous connaissez ?
- Non. Ça sent l'invention.

translation.en: No, it's from Lord of the Rings.
translation.fr: C'est tiré du Seigneur des anneaux.

translation.en: -Well, The Hobbit. -It doesn't matter.
-He asked! -[mockingly] "He asked!"
-[Mike] Shut up, guys! -Hey, hey, hey!
-What'd I just say? -Shut up.
One at a damn time. You.
translation.fr: Un à la fois, bon sang ! Toi.

translation.en: Mirkwood, it's a real road. It's just the name that's made up.
translation.fr:
Mirkwood, c'est une vraie route.
On a inventé le nom.

translation.en: It's where Cornwallis and Kerley meet.
-Yeah, all right, I think I know that-- -We can show you, if you want.
translation.fr:
- Je crois connaître...
- On peut vous montrer.

translation.en: I said that I know it!
-We can help look. -Yeah.
translation.fr: On peut vous aider à chercher.

translation.en: -No. -[boys clamoring]
No. After school, you are all to go home.
translation.fr:
Non. Après les cours,
vous rentrez chez vous.

translation.en: Immediately.
That means no biking around looking for your friend, no investigating,
translation.fr:
N'allez pas en vélo chercher votre ami,
ni enquêter

translation.en: no nonsense.
This isn't some Lord of the Rings book.
translation.fr: On est pas dans Le Seigneur des anneaux.

translation.en: -The Hobbit. -Shut up!
-Hey! -[Mike] Stop it!
[softly] Do I make myself clear?
Do I make myself... clear?
[Mike and Dustin] Yes, sir. [Lucas] Yeah.
Anybody home?
[Will] Password?
Uh, Rada...
[stammering] Radaga-- Radagast?
[Will] Yeah. You may enter.
[Joyce] Thank you, sir.
So, guess what?
I got off early and...
Ta-da! Poltergeist.
I... I thought I wasn't allowed to see it.

Eleven?

Eleven.

Not so hurt he couldn't walk away.

que faites-vous ici ?

maybe he came home.

à aider les recherches.

-Mom! -End of discussion.

personne ne sort.

So we're under house arrest?
Just because Mike's friend got lost on the way home from...

Nancy, come back.

We care.

[boy] Will! [man 1] Will Byers!

Sciences de la vie et de la Terre.

qu'ici-bas nous suffisait,

un sort de protection hier

Hey, guys. You feel that?

Ne fais rien de stupide.

translation.en: Hey, guys, wait up.
Wait up!

Starch and cellulose.
"In a molecule of CH4, the hydrogen atoms are spatially oriented
translation.fr:
"Dans une molécule de CH4,
les atomes d'hydrogène sont orientés

translation.en: -towards the centers of--" -Tetrahedrons.
Wow. Jesus, how many of these did you make?

How about this? How about...
How about every time that you get something right,

-Come on. -No.
-Come on. It'll be fun. -No.

hydrocarbons are separated according to their--"
translation.fr:
les hydrocarbures sont séparés
en fonction de leur..."

translation.en: Melting point.
Ooh, it's boiling points.
That's what I meant.

translation.en: Oh, do you need... Do you need help, or...

What?
Are you crazy? My parents are here.

translation.en: That's weird, I... don't see them.
translation.fr: C'est bizarre. Je ne les vois pas.

translation.en: Was this your plan all along? To... to get in my room and then...

C'était ton plan depuis le début ?
Venir dans ma chambre et...

- avoir un autre trophée ?
- Non. Nancy, non.

translation.en: I'm not Laurie, or Amy, or Becky.

You know, you're so cute when you lie.

Bad Steve.

translation.en: You are beautiful, Nancy Wheeler.

the rate of organic reactions is generally..."

le taux de réactions organiques
est généralement..."

translation.fr: Jonathan, c'est toi qui les as prises ?

translation.en: These are great.
[sniffling] Wow, they really are.
I know I haven't been there for you. [stammers] I've been...
translation.fr: Je sais que je n'ai pas été là pour toi.

translation.en: working so hard and I...
I just feel bad. I don't even... barely know what's going on with you. [chuckles]

translation.en: All right? I am sorry about that.
Hey, what is it?
What is it, honey?
-Nothing. [sniffles] -Tell me. Tell me.
-Come on. You can... -No.
It's just...
[voice breaking] I should've been there for him.
translation.fr: j'aurais dû être là pour lui.

translation.en: [hoarsely] No. Oh, no. You can't do that to yourself.
This was not your fault. Do you hear me?

translation.en: He is... close. I know it. [stammers] I...
translation.fr: Il est... tout près. Je le sais.

translation.en: I feel it in my heart. [sniffles]

translation.en: You just have to... You have to trust me on this, okay?

Tu dois juste me faire confiance
sur ce coup, d'accord ?

translation.en: -Yeah. -Oh, look at this.
Look at this one. Look at this one.
-I mean, that's it, right? -Yeah.
[hoarsely] That's it. That's the one.
-Hello? -[static on phone]
Lonnie?
-Dad? -Hopper?
-[muffled breathing on phone] -Who is this?
-Will? -It's Will?
-[sobs] -Mom, it's Will?
-[yelling] Who is this? -[indistinct growling]
-[yelling] What have you done to my boy? -What? What?
translation.fr:
- Qu'avez-vous fait à mon fils ?
- Quoi ?

translation.en: Give me back my son!
-[groans] -Hello? Hello, who is this?
-Hello? Who is this? -[sobbing]
-Mom, who was it? Who was it, Mom? -[muttering incoherently]
-[sobbing] It was him. -Look at me, Mom. Was it Will?
-Yes. -What did he say?
[sobbing] He just breathed. He just breathed.
-[Jonathan] And was someone else there? -I...
-Mom, who was there? Who was it? -It was him.
I know it was his breathing. I know it was his breathing.
-[thunder rumbling] -[Mike] Will!
-Will! -[Lucas] Byers!
[Dustin] I've got your X-Men 134!
Guys, I really think we should turn back.
[Lucas] Seriously, Dustin?
You wanna be a baby, then go home already!

translation.en: I'm just being realistic, Lucas!
No, you're just being a big sissy!
[Dustin] Did you ever think Will went missing because he ran into something bad?

Will a peut-être disparu
parce qu'il est tombé sur un sale truc.

translation.en: And we're going to the exact same spot where he was last seen?
translation.fr:
Et on va là
où il a été vu pour la dernière fois.

translation.en: -And we have no weapons or anything? -Dustin, shut up.
translation.fr:

- Ferme-la, Dustin.

translation.en: I'm just saying, does that seem smart to you?
-Shut up. Shut up. -[rustling]
Did you guys hear that?
